content.prompt: When Charles Darwin published On the Origin of Species in 1859, he used the phrase "origin of species" to mean which of the following?

choices.label: The original appearance of the species first described in the book of Genesis
The earliest distillation of genera into species
The transmutation of any species into another over time
The degeneration of primal species into variations

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
